name: Underwater Adventures - learning puzzle for toddlers and preschoolers
name_original: Underwater Adventures - learning puzzle for toddlers and preschoolers
description:
It's really a fun game for kids.

Your baby to get acquainted with the inhabitants of the deep sea.

The game is specifically designed for young children.

A fun game for the compilation of the puzzle improves visual perception, knowledge of shapes and develop fine motor skills by capture and drag the puzzle pieces in the appropriate place.
